price: Kuma da yawa wata alƙarya Muka halaka ta, sai azãbarMu ta jẽ mata da dare kõ kuwa sunã mãsu ƙailũla.
arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ هُمۡ قَآئِلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam min qaryatin ahlaknāhā fajāahā basunā bayātan aw hum qāilūna
